problem.p: If 5 cards are dealt from a standard poker deck. What is

ul.li: the size of the sample space,
the probability for a three-of-a-kind, (three cards of the same rank and two cards of two other ranks)
the probability for two pairs, (two cards of the same rank, two cards of another rank and one card of a third rank)
the probability for just one pair? (two cards of the same rank and three cards of three other ranks)
